name: Batman
describtion: Lost both parents at young age.. Got lost in a cave of bats, which became his best friends.

name: Joker
describtion: With a troubled mind The Joker fell into a criminal path.. when trying to escape Batman he fell into acid and were forever changed.

name: Wonderwoman
describtion: Sculpted from clay by her mother Queen Hippolyta. Given life to live as Amason with superhuman powers as gifts by the Greek gods.
